snippet: Blue Shield of California in San Francisco has selected McCann-Erickson San Francisco, a unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies, to handle its account, which had been at Mandelbaum Mooney Ashley in San Francisco since June 1993. The billings w...
lead_paragraph: Blue Shield of California in San Francisco has selected McCann-Erickson San Francisco, a unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies, to handle its account, which had been at Mandelbaum Mooney Ashley in San Francisco since June 1993. The billings were estimated at $10 million to $15 million. McCann San Francisco was awarded the account last week after a monthlong review that was narrowed to that agency and a second finalist, the J. Walter Thompson San Francisco unit of the WPP Group, after Mandelbaum Mooney declined to participate.
